official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to certain small hospitals located in Federal disaster relief areas.
short_title: Small Hospital Disaster Relief Act of 1990

summary.text: Small Hospital Disaster Relief Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make a grant of up to a specified amount to each of four hospitals which: (1) have not more than 50 inpatient beds; (2) had a disproportionate patient percentage of not less than 25 percent during the year before applying for the grant; and (3) are located in a Federal disaster area.

titles.title: Small Hospital Disaster Relief Act of 1990
To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to certain small hospitals located in Federal disaster relief areas.
